Items.ExtraCode: public int rotationCount = 0; public void RotateKey() => rotationCount++;
List<int> codes = new List<int>(); public void PressOne() => codes.Add(1); public void PressTwo() => codes.Add(2); public void PressThree() => codes.Add(3);
Items.TestCode: Execute(); var totalResult = codes[0] == 1 && codes[1] == 3 && codes[2] == 2; codes.Clear();

Items.TestCode: Execute(); var totalResult = codes[0] == 1 && codes[1] == 2 && codes[2] == 3; codes.Clear();
